official_title: Low Dose ICG for Near-infrared Fluorescence Imaging of Biliary Tract and Tumors
inclusion_criteria:
* Patients undergoing standard of care laparoscopic hepatic or biliary operations or Patients undergoing standard of care laparoscopic resection for hepatic tumors: hepatocellular carcinoma or metastatic tumor
Healthy volunteers allowed
Must have minimum age of 18 Years
Must have maximum age of 80 Years
exclusion_criteria: * Patients with a history of adverse reactions or known allergy to ICG, iodine, or iodine dyes and Pregnant and/or lactating patients.
